mapper.insert: insert into letterItem(letterSticNo, letterNo, sticNo, top, left, letterPointX, letterPointY, angle, text) values( seq_letterItem_no.nextval, #{letterNo}, #{stickerNo} , #{top} , #{left}, #{letterPointX} , #{letterPointY} , #{angle} , #{text})

select seq_letter_no.nextval from dual
insert into letter values (#{letterNo}, #{userNo}, sysdate , #{openDay}, #{bgmSrc}, #{readYN}, #{saveYN})
mapper.select: select lt.letterNo, lt.userNo, to_char(lt.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, to_char(lt.openDay, 'yyyy-mm-dd') openDay, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(openDay, 'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(sysdate) dDay, lt.bgmSrc, lt.readYN, lt.saveYN, st.letterSticNo, st.letterNo, st.sticNo, st.text, st.top, st.left, st.letterPointX, st.letterPointY, st.angle from (select letterNo, userNo, regDate, openDay, bgmSrc, readYN, saveYN from letter where saveYN = 'YES') lt, (select lit.letterSticNo, lit.letterNo, lit.sticNo, lit.text, lit.top, lit.left, lit.letterPointX, lit.letterPointY, lit.angle from letterItem lit, (select letterNo, min(letterSticNo) letterSticNo from letterItem where sticno = 9999999 group by letterNo) mnt where lit.letterSticNo = mnt.letterSticNo) st where lt.letterNo=st.letterNo(+) order by readyn asc, openday asc

select lt.letterNo, lt.userNo, to_char(lt.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, to_char(lt.openDay, 'yyyy-mm-dd') openDay, lt.bgmSrc, lt.readYN, lt.saveYN, st.letterSticNo, st.letterNo, st.sticNo, st.text, st.top, st.left, st.letterPointX, st.letterPointY, st.angle from (select letterNo, userNo, regDate, openDay, bgmSrc, readYN, saveYN from letter where saveYN = 'NO') lt, (select lit.letterSticNo, lit.letterNo, lit.sticNo, lit.text, lit.top, lit.left, lit.letterPointX, lit.letterPointY, lit.angle from letterItem lit, (select letterNo, min(letterSticNo) letterSticNo from letterItem where sticno = 9999999 group by letterNo) mnt where lit.letterSticNo = mnt.letterSticNo) st where lt.letterNo=st.letterNo(+) order by regdate desc
